p: The coronavirus disease that first occurred in 2019 has been named COVID-19 [ 9]. The causative agent of this infection is the novel SARS-CoV-2, which tends to replicate in the upper region of the human respiratory system. However, the virus can also enter the lower respiratory tract and can cause lesions despite the patient remaining asymptomatic [ 5].
